languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс галантно склоняет голову.{/n} "Буду рад посвятить тебя во все премудрости игры, которые мне известны самому. Прошу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс галантно склоняет голову.{/n} "Буду рад посвятить тебя во все премудрости игры, которые мне известны самому. Прошу".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс галантно склоняет голову.{/n} "Буду рад посвятить тебя во все премудрости игры, которые мне известны самому. Прошу".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza con cortesía.{/n} «Será un placer mostrarle los entresijos de este oficio que desempeño. Después de usted».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix inclina la cabeza con cortesía.{/n} «Será un placer mostrarle los entresijos de este oficio que desempeño. Después de usted».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは颯爽と首を傾げた。{/n}「俺の知識を共有できるなんて光栄だ。さあ、始めるか」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは颯爽と首を傾げた。{/n}「俺の知識を共有できるなんて光栄だ。さあ、始めるか」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希殷切地低下头。{/n}“这项游戏我所知晓的一切奥秘，我都很乐意介绍给你。带路吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希殷切地低下头。{/n}“这项游戏我所知晓的一切奥秘，我都很乐意介绍给你。带路吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix incline galamment la tête.{/n} « Je serais ravi de vous faire découvrir toutes les subtilités du jeu que je connais. Je vous suis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix incline galamment la tête.{/n} « Je serais ravi de vous faire découvrir toutes les subtilités du jeu que je connais. Je vous suis. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix neigt galant den Kopf.{/n} "Es wäre mir eine Freude, Euch mit all den Feinheiten des Spiels vertraut zu machen, die mi bekannt sind. Geht voraus."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix neigt galant den Kopf.{/n} "Es wäre mir eine Freude, Euch mit all den Feinheiten des Spiels vertraut zu machen, die mi bekannt sind. Geht voraus."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, cesurca başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Oyunu biliyorum, tüm incelikleriyle öğretmekten kıvanç duyarım. Hadi bakalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gallantly inclines his head.{/n} "It would be a pleasure to acquaint you with all the intricacies of the game that I know of. Lead on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cesurca başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bildiğim bu oyunu tüm incelikleriyle öğretmekten kıvanç duyarım. Hadi bakalım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
